00008 bp_api_struct * uvm_ml_sync::_bp_provided_api = NULL;
00009 std::set<double> uvm_ml_sync::_timeset;
00010 
00011 void uvm_ml_sync::pre_sync (uvm_ml_time_unit    time_unit,
00012                             double              time_value)
00013 {
00014 
00015 
00016   if (sc_is_running()) {
00017 
00018     if (((unsigned) time_unit) <= ((unsigned) (sc_time_unit) SC_SEC)) {
00019         sc_time delta = sc_time(time_value, (sc_time_unit)time_unit) - sc_time_stamp();
00020         if(delta.to_double() != 0)
00021             UVM_SC_CO_SIMULATE(delta);
00022         else
00023             UVM_SC_CO_SIMULATE(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00024     }
00025     else
00026         UVM_SC_CO_SIMULATE(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00027   }
00028 }
00029 
00030 void uvm_ml_sync::post_sync ()
00031 {
00032   if (sc_is_running()) {
00033     CO_SIMULATION_EXECUTE_DELTA();
00034 #if (defined(SC_VERSION_MAJOR) && (SC_VERSION_MAJOR >= 2)) && (defined(SC_VERSION_MINOR) && SC_VERSION_MINOR >= 3)
00035     while (sc_pending_activity_at_future_time()) {
00036        sc_time pend = sc_time_to_pending_activity();
00037        if(pend == SC_ZERO_TIME)
00038        {
00039          CO_SIMULATION_EXECUTE_DELTA();
00040        } else {
00041          sc_time next = pend + sc_time_stamp();
00042          unsigned framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00043 
00044          std::set<double>::iterator it;
00045          it = _timeset.find(next.to_double());
00046          if(it == _timeset.end())
00047          {
00048             // new time wakeup request:  insert into timeset and register callback
00049             _timeset.insert(it, next.to_double());
00050             (*_bp_provided_api->register_time_cb_ptr)(framework_id, TIME_UNIT_SEC, next.to_seconds(), NULL);
00051          }
00052          break;
00053        }
00054     } 
00055 #endif
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void uvm_ml_sync::sync (uvm_ml_time_unit    time_unit,
00061                         double              time_value,
00062                         void *              cb_data)
00063 {
00064     // Pre sync
00065     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00066 
00067     sc_time current_time = sc_time_stamp();
00068 
00069     // Remove time from 'set' based on current timestamp of notification
00070     std::set<double>::iterator it;
00071     it = _timeset.find(current_time.to_double());
00072     if(it != _timeset.end())
00073         _timeset.erase(it);
00074 
00075     // Post sync
00076     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00077 }
00078 
00079 void uvm_ml_sync::initialize(bp_api_struct *bp_provided_api) {
00080   _bp_provided_api = bp_provided_api;
00081 }
